#id=1
#text=Baking a Birthday Cake For an Awesome Nephew It was the day before my nephew 's third birthday .
#id=2
#text=I wanted to bake him a very special birthday cake .
#id=3
#text=He loves tractors and anything related to farms , so I wanted to include that when I decorated the cake .
#id=4
#text=I decided to make a cake with three layers since he was going to be three years old .
#id=5
#text=I started by finding recipes for both chocolate and yellow cake since I knew that those were his favorites .
#id=6
#text=I made the batter for the chocolate cake in one bowl and then the batter for the yellow cake in another bowl .
#id=7
#text=I poured some chocolate cake batter in the largest and the smallest round baking pans since the top and bottom layers would be chocolate .
#id=8
#text=I poured yellow cake batter in the medium-sized round baking pan since it would be the middle layer .
#id=9
#text=I baked all three cakes and then cooled them .
#text=After they cooled , I stacked the cakes according to size and I frosted the bottom and top layers with yellow frosting and the middle layer with green frosting .
#text=I decorated the top of the cake with farm animals , a small toy tractor and the words , '' `` Happy Birthday Samuel . '' ''
#text=I topped off the cake with a number 3 candle .
#text=My nephew was very happy when he saw the cake .
#text=He was very surprised that I had baked a cake for him .
